x1=[45 250 225 49.6 240 220 240 16.5 20.5	
    0.2 10.88 19.2 7.75 26.4 26.4 26.4 12.29 6.91	
    1903 208.92 146.92 146.05 6.25 223.1 203.1 -17.29 -5.41];
x2=[22.71 36.68 97.85 240 220 240 110	
    3.0 5.2 3.0 39.63 9.6 39.6 4.95	
    0.71 15.48 68.85 219.9 189.9 209.9 67.05];
x3=[11.82 12.38 6.78 21.9 9.35 14.7 8.48 132 107.2 130.0 120.0	
    5.2 5.2 5.2 5.2 5.2 4.4 5.2 5.2 5.2 8.25 8.25	
    -2.91 -2.41 -8.00 7.12 -2.80 -13.70 -3.66 92.72 65.42 127.25 117.75];
samp=[x1';x2';x3'];
samp=guiyi(samp);
NC=size(samp,1);
[best_pattern,fval]=IA_cluster(@(x)optifun76(x,samp),30,1000,0.9,0.1,3,NC)
